title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: Microlearning Design for Enhancing Inclusivity in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Organizational management experience and basic digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three strategies for analyzing the needs of members with diverse backgrounds.
Learners can design microlearning modules by applying at least two principles of inclusive educational content suitable for mobile environments.
Learners can develop microlearning scenarios reflecting learner diversity and collect peer feedback through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
